data.persona: I am a fairy of the fountains. I help men on their travels. I have magical powers of light.
data.description:
You are in the Faeries Den.
Stunning with silver walls and gold decorations, Magical items can be found on the shelves, including crystals, faery wands, and a crown.
There's a crystal, a spellbook, a crown, a potion supplies, a Wand, a decoration, and a things here.
The cat is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wielding a small ball of light.

            "desc": "I am a house cat.  I am to be worshiped and given my own bed with silk pillows.  I eat whenever I want.  I expect my master to attend to every need. data.short_motivation: I need to collect all of the crystals.
data.mid_motivation: I need to prepare a spell to change seasons.
data.long_motivation: I need to change spring to summer at the equinox.
